user_id.description: The account ID associated with the user Validations: - user_id must be greater than 0

bank_account_id.description: The bank account id Validations: - bank_account_id must be greater than 0

GetBankAccountRequest.title: Get Bank Account Request
GetBankAccountRequest.description: GetBankAccountRequest: Represents the request object invoked against the financial service to get a bank account for a given user and bank account id
